backend/main.mo: Primary Motoko canister implementing land minting logic, data types, registries, and utility functions for CyberGenesis.
CANISTER_REINSTALL_GUIDE.md: Instructions for performing a forced full reinstall of Land and Asset canisters on IC mainnet, including prerequisites and backup requirements.
DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: High‑level deployment checklist covering environment configuration and required variables before deploying CyberGenesis.
DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md: Mainnet deployment guide detailing prerequisites and the full sequence for deploying CyberGenesis Land Mint DApp and assets.
DEPLOYMENT_INSTRUCTIONS.md: Short deployment instruction file describing critical environment setup and the order for deploying all canisters.
DEVELOPER_README.md: Developer documentation describing system architecture, multi‑canister design, and overall DApp functionality.
ENVIRONMENT_CONFIGURATION.md: Guide listing required environment variables for frontend/.env and network configuration details.
ENVIRONMENT_SETUP.md: Environment setup guide explaining how to configure variables and deploy backend canisters for resolving common errors.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing shader integration requirements for CubeVisualization.tsx with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend files.
frontend/.env: Production environment file containing mainnet canister IDs, network settings, and admin configuration.
frontend/.env.example: Template environment file showing required variables, canister IDs, and debug options for local or mainnet use.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the Vite/React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing identity, actor initialization, profile checks, and conditional rendering for loading, reinitialization, and authenticated pages.
frontend/src/asset-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for the asset backend canister, including asset types, user profiles, roles, and all backend method signatures.
frontend/src/asset-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory defining the asset backend service including asset operations, admin queries, access control, and user profile functions.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory defining the main backend canister with land data, rewards, modifiers, loot caches, and user/admin role functions.
frontend/src/components/AdminGLBUpload.t: Admin-only GLB model upload UI handling health checks, authorization, drag/drop, and upload progress management.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin panel for uploading GLB files with health checks, file validation, and simulated upload progress.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterDia: Diagnostics tool running multi-step tests on the asset canister, logging results, checking connectivity, permissions, and cycle balance.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterRei: Provides an admin-only UI workflow to run prechecks, reinitialize the Asset Canister, and perform postchecks with step tracking and authorization checks.
frontend/src/components/CanisterDiagnost: Runs connectivity and health diagnostics for canisters across multiple gateways, producing status reports and recommendations.
frontend/src/components/CanisterIDVerifi: Displays correctness of environment‑configured canister IDs by comparing current and expected values for several canisters.
Validates required environment variables at runtime and shows a fixed critical‑error banner when configuration is invalid.
frontend/src/components/CosmicBackground: Renders an animated 2D starfield and nebula background using a canvas with resize and animation handling.
frontend/src/components/CubeVisualizatio: Renders a biome-based 3D scene with Three.js, including lighting, shaders, environment, and model loading.
frontend/src/components/CyberCube.tsx: Empty placeholder file; all rendering logic was moved to LandModel.tsx.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentVerifi: Checks health of Land and Asset canisters, updates status, and shows diagnostic UI with refresh and icons.
frontend/src/components/Discovery.tsx: Displays land and token info, loads and processes loot caches, and triggers cache discovery with cost checks.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches component errors and displays a styled fallback message.
frontend/src/components/Governance.tsx: Implements staking, proposal creation, and voting UI with hooks for governance canister interactions.
frontend/src/components/LandDashboard.ts: Shows land stats, rewards, upgrades, cooldown tracking, and modifier actions with admin debug options.
frontend/src/components/LandModel.tsx: Loads and configures a GLTF land model with biome‑based emissive and PBR settings, using KTX2 textures and real‑time updates in Three.js.
frontend/src/components/LandSelector.tsx: Displays land info with Russian biome names and provides previous/next navigation between land entries.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Shows a top‑10 land leaderboard with token balances, loading/error states, and styled ranking cards.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Renders an interactive canvas map with drag, pinch, and zoom gestures and highlights the user’s land via coordinate‑based positioning.
frontend/src/components/Marketplace.tsx: Implements buying, listing, filtering, and managing marketplace items including lands and modifiers with UI dialogs and mutation handlers.
Empty placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/NetworkDiagnosti: Runs periodic health checks against the asset canister, tracking latency, connection state, and uptime with expandable UI status display.
frontend/src/components/ParticleBackgrou: Animated 2D canvas particle background with motion, linking lines, resize handling, and cleanup of animation frames.
frontend/src/components/PlotCustomizatio: UI for editing a land plot's name and decoration URL using mutation hooks with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/PlugWalletButton: Wallet button that connects to Plug, shows principal info in a dropdown, and supports copy and disconnect actions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation form allowing users to submit a name, with mutation handling and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/Reinitialization: Fullscreen overlay showing reconnection progress with attempt count, gateway info, and animated indicators.
frontend/src/components/ThreeErrorBounda: Error boundary catching 3D rendering errors, logging them, and showing a fallback UI with reset capability.
frontend/src/config/mainnet.ts: Mainnet configuration defining canister IDs, URLs, feature flags, wallet settings, and utilities for validation and initialization.
Provides a React context for Plug Wallet connection, handling connect/disconnect, actor creation, and connection state.
frontend/src/data/modifierCatalog.ts: Exports a static placeholder catalog of modifiers grouped by rarity tiers with IDs, names, and asset URLs.
frontend/src/governance-backend.d.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and result variants for governance backend types, proposals, voting, and staking APIs.
frontend/src/governance-backend.idl.ts: Declares the Candid IDL service for the governance backend, including proposal, voting, and staking methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on identity and reinitializes queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReinitializer: Hook that retries actor creation across multiple gateways with delays and toast notifications on success or failure.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithInit.ts: Hook that wraps useActor with initialization logic, timeout handling, and polling backend health checks before marking ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetActor.ts: Creates and validates the asset canister actor with environment checks, gateway health testing, and retry logic for robust initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetHealth.ts: Performs a delayed health check against the asset canister’s /health endpoint and returns a simple health status.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetUpload.ts: Provides logic for uploading GLB files to the asset canister using Plug wallet authentication and progress tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useGovernanceActor.ts: Initializes the governance canister actor with Internet Identity, retry logic, gateway selection, and timeout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing authentication state, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketplaceActor.t: Initializes the marketplace canister actor with identity support, retry logic, and gateway failover similar to the governance actor.
Provides generic and specific Plug Wallet transaction hooks for token, marketplace, and governance canisters using react‑query mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines data-fetching and mutation hooks for land data, user profiles, tokens, and placeholder governance/marketplace types using react‑query.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenActor.ts: Initializes the token canister actor with gateway failover, retries, timeout handling, and Internet Identity integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles with Tailwind, dark theme variables, neon glow effects, and glassmorphism UI elements.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Exports build timestamp/version helpers and utilities for cache‑busting URLs and logging build info.
frontend/src/lib/debugConfig.ts: Provides debug utilities for 3D components, including logs, GPU diagnostics, performance timers, and renderer detection.
frontend/src/lib/modelLoader.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/lib/tokenUtils.ts: Provides helpers to format and parse token amounts using configurable decimals, including thousands separators and balance checks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for marketplace canister types, listings, buy results, and service methods.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory defining marketplace canister types and service endpoints.
frontend/src/pages/Collection.tsx: Renders a modifier collection page with rarity tiers and visual cards based on a catalog.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard handling land data fetching, tab navigation, and rendering multiple feature views.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing screen that handles Internet Identity login with visual effects and error messaging.
frontend/src/pages/MintingPage.tsx: Displays land initialization status and loading states while fetching actor and land data.
frontend/src/pages/VerificationPage.tsx: Page for verifying canister IDs with a styled UI and link back to home.
frontend/src/token-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for ICRC-1 token canister accounts, transfers, errors, metadata, and admin methods.
frontend/src/token-backend.idl.ts: Defines the ICRC-1 token canister IDL with account, transfer, metadata, and mint interfaces.
frontend/src/types/webgpu.d.ts: Provides TypeScript type declarations for WebGPU APIs to allow compile‑time support detection.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, environment variables, WASM asset handling, custom build filenames, and dev server proxying.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing shader‑related requirements, state, and existing feature tracking.
README_RUSSIAN.md: Russian‑language quickstart guide for installing dependencies and running CyberGenesis.
scripts/upload_assets_mainnet.sh: Mainnet script to upload .glb assets to the AssetCanister with rate limiting and verification.
scripts/upload_assets.sh: Local network script to batch upload 3D model assets to an AssetCanister using dfx.
unknown.txt: Contains an incomplete line referencing testing a health endpoint.
